Great up, odd sound issues though. It's just crunchy overall, but still playable. And the HD Textures look great! Thanks.
Everything works for me, I don't need crack, sound is OK, but if you have sound issues, try this: In Quick Setup window click on Advanced, and untick everything, mainly Disable Hardware 3D Sound
